linkedin:
Dear Sender
This is Jennie, Virtual Assistant of Mr. Sinha responding on his behalf.
Since Abhishek checks Linkedin very sporadically, please expect a delay in response. In case you want to get in touch with him earlier please reach out to him on abhi.bill@gmail.com.
Please start you subject line with [<Purpose>].
For ex: If you want to send mail about job opportunity please put subject line as "[Opportunity] Reaching out from XYZ"
Regards,
Jennie
To know more about me visit https://github.com/sinha-abhishek/jennie
